chapter.title: Overview
chapter.para: This developers guide is intended for two groups of developers,

itemizedlist.listitem: those wishing to develop applications that make use of (i.e. integrate) components of the Scribble tool chain, and
those wishing to develop additional components (or alternative implementations) for the Scribble tool chain

chapter.para: The document initially discusses information about the project itself, to provide background information on how issues are managed, and the build and distribution performed.
The document then discusses the architecture of the tool chain.
Finally we will look in more detail at how a validation module can be added to the tool chain.
